simpleVR

Class SimpleOpenVR

  • java.lang.Object
    • simpleVR.SimpleOpenVR

  • public class SimpleOpenVR
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements a simple VR application that renders to an HMD via OpenVR. OpenVR functionality is provided by the OpenVRRenderPanel. Also demonstrates tracking of a VR hand controller.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SimpleOpenVR.SimpleVRRenderPanel
      An extension of OpenVRRenderPanel to provide a call-back function for initialization.

      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
